name: cypress-mailosaur
description: Extends Cypress' cy commands that let you integrate email and SMS testing into your continuous integration process.
author: Mailosaur Ltd

scripts.lint: if [ -n "$CI" ]; then (npm run lint:strict) else (npm run lint:default) fi
scripts.lint:default: npx biome check . --diagnostic-level=warn && npx tsc && npx tsc -p test/tsconfig.json
scripts.lint:strict: npx biome check . --error-on-warnings && npx tsc && npx tsc -p test/tsconfig.json
scripts.build: npm run lint && npx tsc -p tsconfig.json
scripts.test: npm run build && cd test && npm run test:ci
scripts.test:ci: npm run build && cd test && npm i && npm run test:ci
